value.name: Photos: Police reform activists gather in St. Louis to remember George Floyd
value.description: Several activist groups, led by Defund. Re-envision. Transform gathered at Poelker Park in downtown St. Louis for a community vigil on the one-year anniversary of the murder of George Floyd

value.name: Protest held on the anniversary of Isaiah Hammett's death at the hands of a SWAT team
value.description: The Coalition Against Police Crimes and Repression held a protest in the 5400 block of South Kingshighway on the third anniversary of Isaiah Hammett's death at the hands of a SWAT team.

value.name: Wandering cops shuffle departments, abusing citizens
value.description: One of the biggest roadblocks to police accountability is so-called “wandering cops” who lose their jobs in one place only to be rehired in another.
